meanings.sent1: The tiny niched in the wall held a beautiful vase.
meanings.sent2: The museum had many niched to showcase ancient artifacts.

meanings.definition: To place or position in a niche.
meanings.sent1: She carefully niched the book back on the shelf.
meanings.sent2: The chef niched the spices on the kitchen rack for easy access.
meanings.sent3: He niched his favorite mug next to the coffee machine every morning.
meanings.sent4: The gardener niched the new plant in the garden bed with care.
